title: Lake Mead National Recreation Area: Guest Speakers
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     Education     Parks as Classrooms     Guest Speakers                Guest Speakers         Welcoming a new Jr. Ranger    Depending on the type of program you are interested in, we can match you with the appropriate education venue from large, grade level assemblies to more active, hands-on individual classroom presentations.   To request a guest speaker please email us at LAKE_education@nps.gov with the following information:    Desired program topic(s): (e.g., invasive species, water cycle, National Park Service) Number of students Requested date & time Desired duration of the program Age/grade of participants School name & address:    Â      Water Safety in the Classroom 1st and 2nd grades: Life Jackets Float - You Don't! Dowload complete program description 3rd and 4th grades: Saved by the Jacket! Download complete program description 5th grade: Talk, Reach, Throw, Don't Go! Download complete program description
